description: This file declares functions related to broadcasting backup and restore events within a system, particularly for generating upgrade events and notifying iControl processes about restore steps.

methods.name: startBackupRestoreEventProducer
methods.description: Initializes the backup and restore event producer system.

methods.name: stopBackupRestoreEventProducer
methods.description: Shuts down the backup and restore event producer system.

methods.name: broadcastRestoreEvent
methods.description: Broadcasts a restore step event, indicating the current step number, its name, and whether it was successful.
